correspondence.message: I didn't meet the credit threshold of 90 ECTS and have been working on my master's thesis since the end of July. How do I apply for an extension or suspension?"

An application for a deadline extension is sufficient. Information and templates can be found at https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studierende/beratung/informatik/tipps/haertefallantraege/. You can also send the documents by email. If you have any further questions, please feel free to come to the office hours, although it may be full.
